title: Systematic typedesigns for display
content:
Hi folks,  
I new here at typophile.

I'm doing some experiments 'bout display types and I want to do them very systematic. What i'm looking for is links to other great designeres (like the bauhaus period) whom has been working with systemac grid and like ...

Hope you all have some great links.

Cool forum by the way.

All best and have great weekend.  
Jakob
author: Jakob Monefeldt
